name: schema-validator-agent
description: Automated schema validator for testing URLs against Schema.org and Google Rich Results Test

scripts.build:web: echo "Skipping Electron build for web deployment"
scripts.build: node -e "if (process.env.VERCEL || process.env.CI) { console.log('Skipping Electron build for web deployment'); process.exit(0); } else { require('child_process').execSync('npm run build:desktop', {stdio:'inherit'}); }"
